Chapter I - The Awakening (Playtime â‰ˆ 30 Min )
You wake up at the steering wheel of a car that's not yours, feeling disoriented and alarmed. Your hands are stained with blood, but you have no memory of how it happened. Suddenly, a phone rings, breaking the silence. It's your only clue, a lifeline to the past you can't remember. As you answer, you realize this is just the beginning of an extraordinary journey to uncover your true identity.

Embark on a quest filled with uncertainties and dangers. With each call and message, you connect with various characters, each holding pieces of the puzzle you desperately need to solve. But be cautious - in this world, friends are hard to distinguish from foes. Trust is a luxury you may not be able to afford.

As you delve deeper into this enigmatic narrative, you'll find yourself in the midst of a web of secrets, conspiracies, and unexpected twists. Every interaction, every choice you make has the potential to change the course of your story. Navigate through this complex maze, where each revelation leads to more questions.

Are you prepared to face the shocking truths about yourself and the events that led you here? The road ahead is fraught with 'WTF' moments that will challenge your perceptions and test your resolve.
Get ready for a thrilling adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat, a ride full of breathtaking moments that will leave you questioning everything. The answer lies ahead, but are you prepared for what you might find?
